episodes.synopsis: The five-astronaut crew of Pegasus begin their six-year mission by first visiting Venus, with an environment harsher than expected.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Pegasus reaches the solar system's largest planet, Jupiter, where the crew must survive radiation 500 times the human lethal dose before moving on.
episodes.title: Episode 2

video.title: Space Odyssey: Voyage to the Planets
video.synopsis: In this docudrama, astronauts embark on a dangerous space voyage to explore the inner and outer planets of our solar system.
